EmailTemplate.name: 2020.02.11- BS - Customer Dashboard Email.BS - Customer Dashboard Email New
EmailTemplate.subject: We've Made Even More Improvements
EmailTemplate.textOnly: View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=EBBSCUSTOMERDASHBOARD20EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> We continue to listen to your feedback – thank you for letting us know how we can create a more efficient buying experience. Our latest updates now allow you to: Customize Your Dashboard by dragging and dropping your most used features into your preferred layout Access features such as order tracking, frequent orders and favourites faster and easier Don’t worry about navigating this new amazing feature, our onboarding guide will be available to you as soon as you log in. Show Me My New Dashboard <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=EBBSCUSTOMERDASHBOARD20EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
